item.title: 'Hello, Stranger' hits the shops this July
item.description: We’re delighted that our very own Will Buckingham’s Hello, Stranger: How We Find Connection in a Disconnected World is coming out from Granta this July 1st. Will’s book brings together insights from philosophy, anthropology, history and literature to explore how our traditions of meeting with strangers can mitigate the issues of our time.
